title: Create Content Standards Request
description: Request parameters for creating a new content standards configuration

countries_all.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. Standards apply in ALL listed countries (AND logic).

channels_any.description: Advertising channels. Standards apply to ANY of the listed channels (OR logic).

languages.description: BCP 47 language tags (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'fr'). Required - content is evaluated in these languages.

policy.description: Natural language policy describing acceptable and unacceptable content contexts. Used by LLMs and human reviewers to make judgments.

calibration_exemplars.description: Training/test set to calibrate policy interpretation. Supports both simplified domain references and full artifact definitions.

oneOf.description: Simplified domain reference for quick calibration setup

type.description: Indicates this is a domain-level reference

language.description: BCP 47 language tag for content on this domain

oneOf.description: Full artifact definition for detailed calibration

floor.description: Safety floor baseline - a reference to an external floor definition. The floor defines universal content exclusions (hate speech, illegal content, etc.) that apply regardless of brand-specific policy.

url.description: URL to the floor definition document

version.description: Version of the floor definition being referenced
